texScrollForwardSpeedScale.Wiki: Movement speed until the scroll completes one revolution (Km/h)

texScrollAngleSpeedScale.Wiki: Rotating speed until the scroll completes one revolution (rad/frame)

paramL_forwardAnimID.Wiki: Animation ID of the wheel part when moving forward

paramL_backAnimID.Wiki: Animation ID of the wheel part when moving backwards

paramR_forwardAnimID.Wiki: Animation ID of the wheel part when moving forward

paramR_backAnimID.Wiki: Animation ID of the wheel part when moving backwards

WheelLeftBackIndex.Wiki: The leftmost rear index in the wheel internal control parameters

WheelRightBackIndex.Wiki: The rightmost rear index in the wheel internal control parameters

texScrollForwardTexSpeedScale.Wiki: Movement speed until the scroll completes one revolution (Km/h)

texScrollAngleTexSpeedScale.Wiki: Rotating speed until the scroll completes one revolution (rad/frame)

footIKChangeTime.Wiki: Interpolation time of animation of wheel and belt part when FootIK is enabled/disabled
